description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Hu Tao is a Pyro polearm user who excels at high single-target damage and Pyro reactions.

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames (2) + Shimenawa's Reminiscence (2)

talents: Normal Attack: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
info: Hu Tao is a top-tier Pyro DPS, excelling at single-target damage and Vaporize/Melt reactions. Build her for CRIT DMG, HP%, and Pyro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
skills.desc: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guide to Afterlife
skills.desc: Hu Tao consumes a portion of her HP to enter the Paramita Papilio state, increasing her ATK based on Max HP and converting her attack DMG to Pyro.
skills.details_html:
Guide to Afterlife
Consumes a portion of HP to enter the Paramita Papilio state, increasing ATK based on Max HP and converting attack DMG to Pyro. Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect, dealing Pyro DMG over time.

skills.name: Spirit Soother
skills.desc: Hu Tao commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing massive Pyro DMG in a large AoE. Regenerates HP for each enemy hit if Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50%.
skills.details_html:
Spirit Soother
Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing massive Pyro DMG in a large AoE. Regenerates HP for each enemy hit if Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50%.

passive_talents.name: Flutter By
passive_talents.desc: When Paramita Papilio state ends, all allies' CRIT Rate is increased by 12% for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Sanguine Rouge
passive_talents.desc: Hu Tao gains a 33% Pyro DMG Bonus when her HP is equal to or less than 50%.

passive_talents.name: The More the Merrier
passive_talents.desc: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has an 18% chance to receive an additional 'Suspicious' dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.desc: Hu Tao can use Charged Attacks without consuming stamina while in Paramita Papilio state.

constellations.name: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.desc: Increases Blood Blossom DMG by 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.

constellations.name: Lingering Carmine
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Guide to Afterlife by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.desc: Enemies affected by Blood Blossom are reduced by 12% in DEF.

constellations.name: Floral Incense
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Spirit Soother by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.desc: Hu Tao receives a one-time revival when taking fatal damage, restoring 200% of her Max HP and granting 100% CRIT Rate and 200% RES to interruption for 10s.
